doc.title: Evlat ugruna
doc.plot: Upon her father's death, Oya comes to Istanbul and finds a job as a singer at Vural's bar. Vural fancies her but Oya doesn't feel anything for him. In an accident Oya meets the attorney Dogan, they fall in love and marry despite of Dogan's objection to this marriage. Dogan doesn't know about Oya's former job. Vural blackmails Oya by saying that he will tell Dogan the truth, unless Oya gets him the money he wants. As Dogan's mother finds out about this Oya leaves home. She is pregnant and delivers a girl named Sevgi. Time passes and Vural meets and becomes attracted to Sevgi, who now has grown-up. Sevgi starts working at Vural's bar. In order to save her daughter's future, Oya shoots Vural. She is taken to court where Dogan is the judge. There he learns about Sevgi. Oya is ill and dies after revealing Dogan everything.
